data.title: United States Courts Opinions
data.meta_description: Help accessing United States Courts Opinions within GovInfo, including searching and browsing tips as well as contextual information, URL examples, fielded searches, and specific metadata values.
data.text:
Searching United States Courts Opinions

You can find United States Courts Opinions by:

Using Basic Search for keyword and metadata fielded searches,

Using Advanced Search; fields specific to the U.S. Courts Opinions collection will display after you select U.S. Courts Opinions in the Refine by Collection column,

Refining search results by clicking on links in the Refine Your Search panel on the left hand side of the page (the sections under Refine Your Search correspond to the metadata available for the documents), and

Browsing the U.S. Courts Opinions browse page.

General GovInfo Search Tips

Search Examples

Search by Court Type For example, District Court opinions.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts courttype:district

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Court Type from the first box and select District from the next box

Search by Court Name For example, United States Bankruptcy Court Southern District of Florida.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts courtname:"United States Bankruptcy Court Southern District of Florida"

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Court Name from the first box and select United States Bankruptcy Court Southern District of Florida from the next box

Search by Title For example, opinions with "hatch" in the title.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts title:hatch

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Title from the first box and enter hatch in the next box

Search by Case Number For example, opinions with "1:01-bk-13984" as the Case Number.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts casenumber:(1:01-bk-13984)

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Case Number from the first box and enter 1:01-bk-13984 in the next box

Search by Party Name For example, opinions with "hatch" as one of the party names.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts partyname:hatch

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Party Name from the first box and enter hatch in the next box

Search by Docket Text For example, opinions with "judge lisi" in the docket text.

Using Basic Search, enter: collection:uscourts dockettext:(judge lisi)

Using Advanced Search, select United States Courts Opinions under Refine by Collection, then under Search In, select Docket Text from the first box and enter judge lisi in the next box

United States Courts Opinions Metadata Fields and Values

Metadata fields and values can be used to increase the relevancy of your searches. The metadata fields available for United States Courts Opinions are listed in the table below. Metadata fields and values are used throughout GovInfo for

Narrowing Your Search,

Browsing Government Publications,

Field Operators,

Advanced Search, and

Display on Details Pages.

Metadata fields and values can be entered into the Basic Search box using field operators. The field operators available for the U.S. Courts Opinions collection are listed in the table below, along with examples for each metadata field. Using Field Operators

Some of these metadata fields are made available for use in Advanced Search. The metadata values can be entered in the same format for the fields available on the Advanced Search Page. Using Advanced Search

Metadata Field Display Name

Metadata Field Definition

Field Operator

Field Operator Example

United States Courts Opinions Metadata Value Lists

Court Metadata Values

The table below lists the metadata values which can be used when limiting your search using the Court Name, Court Type, Circuit, and State advanced search fields or the courtname:, courttype:, circuit:, and state: field operators.

Court Code

Court Type

Court Name

Circuit

State

Case Number Metadata Values

Case numbers provided in metadata by the courts have been converted to user readable case numbers based on the manner in which they are typically cited. See below for information on how these case numbers have been converted for each type of court. The user readable version is displayed on GovInfo, however users can search by either value using the Case Number advanced search field or the casenumber: field operator.

Appellate:

Four digits after the dash, five if the fifth is a non-zero, etc.

09-02525 to 09-2525

District:

Three digits after the dash, four if the fourth is a non-zero, etc.

1:06-cv-00007 to 06-007

1:07-md-01842 to 07-1842

1:03-cr-00116 to 03-116

1:03-mj-00116 to 03-116

1:03-mc-00116 to 03-116

Bankruptcy:

Four digits after the dash, five if the fifth is a non-zero, etc.

0:06-bk-13274 to 06-13274

1:10-ap-03696 to 10-3696

1:10-bk-49009 to 10-49009

Nature of Suit Metadata Values

The table below lists the metadata values that can be used when targeting your search using the Nature of Suit advanced search field or the naturesuit: field operator. Note that the proper way to use the field operator in the search box should look like this, e.g., naturesuit:(insurance). It is not possible to search using the Nature of Suite "code".

Nature of Suit Metadata Values

Nature of Suit Code
